IMAGE_COMPRESSION.TITLE: Image Compression
IMAGE_COMPRESSION.DESCRIPTION: PNG compression is lossless, so it might not reduce the file size significantly and higher compression values might affect the performance. JPG and WebP compression is lossy.

CUSTOM_MODELS.TITLE: ADD CUSTOM MODELS
CUSTOM_MODELS.DESCRIPTION: You can add your own models easily. For more details:

CUSTOM_INPUT_RESOLUTION.TITLE: CUSTOM OUTPUT WIDTH
CUSTOM_INPUT_RESOLUTION.DESCRIPTION: Use a custom width for the output images. The height will be adjusted automatically. Enabling this will override the scale setting.

DONATE.DESCRIPTION: If you like what we do :)

GPU_ID_INPUT.TITLE: GPU ID
GPU_ID_INPUT.DESCRIPTION: Please read the Upscayl Documentation for more information.
GPU_ID_INPUT.ADDITIONAL_DESCRIPTION: Enable performance mode on Windows for better results.

COPY_METADATA.TITLE: COPY IMAGE METADATA
COPY_METADATA.DESCRIPTION: Keep original image metadata (EXIF) in the upscaled image.
COPY_METADATA.SUGGEST_JPG_DESCRIPTION: For better metadata compatibility across different systems, we recommend using JPG format. Would you like to change?

IMAGE_SCALE.TITLE: Image Scale
IMAGE_SCALE.DESCRIPTION: Anything above 4X (except 16X Double Upscayl) only resizes the image and does not use AI upscaling.
IMAGE_SCALE.WARNING: Anything above 5X may cause performance issues on some devices!
IMAGE_SCALE.ADDITIONAL_WARNING: This may cause performance issues on some devices!

OVERWRITE_TOGGLE.TITLE: OVERWRITE PREVIOUS UPSCALE
OVERWRITE_TOGGLE.DESCRIPTION: If enabled, Upscayl will process the image again instead of loading it directly.

RESET_SETTINGS.ALERT: Upscayl has been reset. Please restart the app.

SAVE_OUTPUT_FOLDER.TITLE: SAVE OUTPUT FOLDER
SAVE_OUTPUT_FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: If enabled, the output folder will be remembered between sessions.

AUTO_UPDATE.TITLE: AUTO UPDATE UPSCAYL
AUTO_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION: If enabled, the application will check for new updates and notify you.

ENABLE_CONTRIBUTION.TITLE: HELP IMPROVE UPSCAYL
ENABLE_CONTRIBUTION.DESCRIPTION: If enabled, Upscayl will collect anonymous usage data to improve the application interface and features.

CUSTOM_TILE_SIZE.TITLE: CUSTOM TILE SIZE
CUSTOM_TILE_SIZE.DESCRIPTION: Use a custom tile size for segmenting the image. This can help process images faster by reducing the number of tiles generated.

TURN_OFF_NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: TURN OFF NOTIFICATIONS
TURN_OFF_NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: If enabled, Upscayl will not send any system notifications on success or failure.

TTA_MODE.TITLE: TTA Mode
TTA_MODE.DESCRIPTION: Enable Test Time Augmentation for better results, such as removing artifacts BUT this will increase the processing time by 8x!

BATCH_MODE.TITLE: Batch Upscayl
BATCH_MODE.DESCRIPTION: This will let you Upscayl all files in a folder at once

upscayl-lite-4x.NAME: Upscayl Lite
upscayl-lite-4x.DESCRIPTION: Suitable for most images. High-speed upscaling with minimal quality loss.

remacri-4x.NAME: Remacri (Non-Commercial)
remacri-4x.DESCRIPTION: For natural images. Added sharpness and detail. No commercial use.

ultramix-balanced-4x.NAME: Ultramix (Non-Commercial)
ultramix-balanced-4x.DESCRIPTION: For natural images with a balance of sharpness and detail.

ultrasharp-4x.NAME: Ultrasharp (Non-Commercial)
ultrasharp-4x.DESCRIPTION: For natural images with a focus on sharpness.

high-fidelity-4x.NAME: High Fidelity
high-fidelity-4x.DESCRIPTION: For all kinds of images with a focus on realistic details and smooth textures.

DOUBLE_UPSCAYL.TITLE: Double Upscayl
DOUBLE_UPSCAYL.DESCRIPTION: Enable this option to run upscayl twice on an image. Note that this may cause a significant increase in processing time and possibly performance issues for scales greater than 4X.

OUTPUT_PATH_SELECTION.TITLE: Step 3
OUTPUT_PATH_SELECTION.MAC_APP_STORE_ALERT:
Due to MacOS App Store security restrictions, Upscayl requires you to select an output folder everytime you start it.

To avoid this, you can permanently save a default output folder in the Upscayl 'Settings' tab.

SCALE_SELECTION.TITLE: Step 4
SCALE_SELECTION.NO_OUTPUT_FOLDER_ALERT: Please select an output folder first

RIGHT_PANE_INFO.SELECT_FOLDER_DESCRIPTION: Make sure that the folder doesn't contain anything except PNG, JPG, JPEG & WEBP images.
RIGHT_PANE_INFO.SELECT_IMAGES_DESCRIPTION: Select or drag and drop a PNG, JPG, JPEG or WEBP image.
RIGHT_PANE_INFO.PASTE_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Hit Ctrl+V or ‚åò+V to Paste image from Clipboard

GPU_ERROR.TITLE: GPU Error
GPU_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Ran into an issue with the GPU. Please read the docs for troubleshooting! ({data})

READ_WRITE_ERROR.TITLE: Read/Write Error
READ_WRITE_ERROR.DESCRIPTION:
Make sure that the path is correct and you have proper read/write permissions 
({data})

TILE_SIZE_ERROR.TITLE: Error
TILE_SIZE_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: The tile size is wrong. Please change the tile size in the settings or set to 0 ({data})

EXCEPTION_ERROR.TITLE: Exception Error
EXCEPTION_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Upscayl encountered an error. Possibly, the upscayl binary failed to execute the commands properly. Try checking the logs to see if you get any information. You can post an issue on Upscayl's GitHub repository for more help.

NO_OUTPUT_FOLDER_ERROR.TITLE: Set Output Folder
NO_OUTPUT_FOLDER_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Please select an output folder first

INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.TITLE: Invalid Image
INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Please select/paste an image with a valid extension like PNG, JPG, JPEG, JFIF or WEBP.
INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.ADDITIONAL_DESCRIPTION: Please drag and drop an image
INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.CLIPBOARD_DESCRIPTION: No Image file found in Clipboard to paste!

NO_IMAGE_ERROR.TITLE: No image selected
NO_IMAGE_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Please select an image to upscale

METADATA_ERROR.TITLE: Metadata Copy Error
METADATA_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Could not copy metadata from the original image to the generated image. ({data})

METADATA_FORMAT.TITLE: Metadata Warning
METADATA_FORMAT.DESCRIPTION: On some systems, metadata may not be visible in formats other than JPG. Use specific tools to view metadata if needed.

UPSCAYL_CLOUD.ADD_SUCCESS: Thank you for joining the waitlist! We will notify you when Upscayl Cloud is ready for you.
